Name: Hands of Wisp
About the game: Control the energy called Wisp in an Action RPG, surviving against various unknown creatures while crossing maps and scenarios. Question, together with Wisp, how generic and empty your mission can be and what this whole universe means. Inspired by Action RPG Games. Hands of Wisp is simple, but was created with much affection. Advance through maps and scenarios defeating enemies who try to stop you while you find your motivation. Throughout the game, discover the weight of the empty and how this is important for all creatures in this universe. Features: - Explore the sceneries of Cave, Snow, Water Distortion, Electric Zone and one last dark scenario. - Gradually be able to control elements that will help you to cross the scenarios and can influence against certain enemies. - Defeat the strongest creature of each scenario so that Wisp can summon a new element. - Explore the dialogues gradually to try to understand the entire Game Universe and the motivation of the characters.
